channel.title: Women In Technology Galway Meetup April 2016 on Lynda O'Leary

item.title: Women In Technology Galway meetup-April 2016
item.description:
Thank you to everyone who attended our meetup and to our guest speakers:

  • Ashley Fielding, Shopify
  • Andrew Hind, Shopify
  • Dr Sandra Riordan, WITS
  • Tara Dalrymple, Superpixel labs.

    • A special thanks to our hosts Superpixel labs for setting up the space and refreshments. The space is amazing, vibrant, and energising.

    Missed the meetup?

    If you missed the meetup, donâ€™t worry we will host another meetup at the end of April. Watch for updates on Women in Technology Galway meetup.

    Get involved

    I would love to hear your ideas. Follow us on twitter @techwomengalway or join the Women in Technology Galway meetup.
